mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les frères Agasse allant au supplice, leurs corps rendus à leur famille
The brothers Agasse going to torture, their bodies returned to their family
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Several soldiers stand at attention as a wagon with men inside passes through a crowd of citizens. Several buildings are shown in the background
